scripts.install:all: npm run install:server && npm run install:client
scripts.build:all: npm run build:server && npm run build:client
scripts.docker:build: npm run docker:build:server && npm run docker:build:client
scripts.docker:run:server: docker stop gridllm-server-container 2>/dev/null || true && docker rm gridllm-server-container 2>/dev/null || true && docker run -d -p 4000:4000 --name gridllm-server-container --network bridge -e NODE_ENV=development -e PORT=4000 -e REDIS_HOST=host.docker.internal -e REDIS_PORT=6379 -e LOG_LEVEL=info gridllm-server
scripts.docker:run:client: docker stop gridllm-client-container 2>/dev/null || true && docker rm gridllm-client-container 2>/dev/null || true && docker run -d -p 3000:3000 --name gridllm-client-container --network bridge -e NODE_ENV=development -e PORT=3000 -e WORKER_ID=worker-docker-001 -e SERVER_HOST=host.docker.internal -e SERVER_PORT=4000 -e OLLAMA_HOST=host.docker.internal -e OLLAMA_PORT=11434 gridllm-client
scripts.docker:run: npm run docker:build && npm run docker:run:server && npm run docker:run:client
scripts.docker:clean: npm run docker:stop && docker rm gridllm-server-container gridllm-client-container 2>/dev/null || true && docker rmi gridllm-server gridllm-client 2>/dev/null || true
scripts.docker:logs: echo '=== Server Logs ===' && docker logs gridllm-server-container 2>/dev/null || echo 'Server not running' && echo '=== Client Logs ===' && docker logs gridllm-client-container 2>/dev/null || echo 'Client not running'
scripts.docker:status: echo '=== Container Status ===' && docker ps --filter 'name=gridllm' --format 'table {{.Names}}\t{{.Status}}\t{{.Ports}}' && echo '=== Health Checks ===' && curl -s http://localhost:4000/health || echo 'Server not responding' && curl -s http://localhost:3000/health || echo 'Client not responding'
scripts.compose:clean: docker compose down -v --remove-orphans && docker compose rm -f
scripts.bundle: echo 'Starting GridLLM bundle (Server + Redis)...' && docker compose up -d redis server
scripts.bundle:full: echo 'Starting GridLLM full bundle (Server + Redis + Client)...' && docker compose up -d
scripts.make:bundle-with-client: echo 'Starting GridLLM full bundle (Server + Redis + Client)...' && docker compose up -d
scripts.logs:server:docker: docker logs -f gridllm-server-container 2>/dev/null || echo 'Server container not running'
scripts.logs:client:docker: docker logs -f gridllm-client-container 2>/dev/null || echo 'Client container not running'
scripts.logs:server:native: tail -f server/logs/GridLLM-server.log 2>/dev/null || echo 'No native server logs found'
scripts.logs:client:native: tail -f client/logs/GridLLM-client.log 2>/dev/null || echo 'No native client logs found'
scripts.clean: rm -rf server/dist client/dist dist && rm -rf server/logs/* client/logs/* logs/* 2>/dev/null || true
scripts.setup: npm run install:all && echo 'Setup complete - configure .env files as needed'
scripts.status: echo '=== GridLLM Network Status ===' && curl -s http://localhost:4000/health | jq '.' 2>/dev/null || echo 'Server not responding' && curl -s http://localhost:3000/health | jq '.' 2>/dev/null || echo 'Client not responding'
